examples.example: 我每天都按时睡觉，让自己保持充足的精力面对新的一天。

translate.english: I go to bed on time every day to keep myself full of energy to face the new day.

examples.example: 忙碌了一天后，我舒舒服服地睡觉，为明天养精蓄锐。

translate.english: After a busy day, I slept comfortably to recharge my batteries for tomorrow.

examples.example: 每晚睡觉前，我都会读一会儿书，让内心更加平静充实。

translate.english: Before going to bed every night, I will read books for a while to make my heart more peaceful and fulfilling.
